title: 计分板指令求助
author: z1643452507

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: /scoreboard players add @e[r=5,type=Item] itme 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:leather",tag:{display:{Name:"xxx"}}}}复制代码你需要tag并且去掉s并且双引号对称……我勒个擦

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
scoreboard players add @e[r=5,type=Item] itme 1 {Item:{id:minecraft:leather"},{display:{Name:xxx}}}
去掉最后的s，名字中没有单位

 ...
